oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Jimmy Garner and William Green Hill, models for the characters in the Miss Minerva books by Frances Boyd Calhoun, Angus Macdonall, and Robert Drake.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Hill, son of a prominent Tennessee physician, Dr. Lafayette Hill, reportedly died alone and penniless in a railroad car in Colorado at age 64.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: RG 82: Tennessee Department of Conservation Photograph Collection, 1937-1976
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Men; Literature; Fictitious characters
